last_episode_to_air.name: Mitefall!
last_episode_to_air.overview: Bat-Mite tries to make the show so horrible it has to be cancelled.

name: Batman: The Brave and the Bold
original_name: Batman: The Brave and the Bold
overview: The Caped Crusader is teamed up with Blue Beetle, Green Arrow, Aquaman and countless others in his quest to uphold justice.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Batman wings into an exciting new era, teaming with a mighty honour roll of DC Comics Super Heroes in the debut season of the smart, hip TV series! The Brave and the Bold features Batman and allies Aquaman, Green Arrow, Blue Beetle, Booster Gold, Robin, Wildcat, Deadman, Plastic Man, Red Tornado, Bronze Tiger, Dr. Fate and The Atom fighting foes from mad scientists to intergalactic crooks, from power-mad dictators to out-of-control teenagers teenagers! He even partners with another legendary detective: Sherlock Holmes! In this cool, cutting-edge and often funny series, bringing back old-school comic book styling and dry wit to crimefighting, Batman faces any peril - including other heroes stealing the show - in his relentless pursuit of justice.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Braver. Bolder. Season two of Batman: The Brave and the Bold delivers more of the action you want, as the caped crusader continues to team up with heroes from across the DC Universe in this latest interpretation of the classic Batman franchise. Featuring non-stop adventure with a touch of comic relief, Blue Beetle, Green Arrow, Aquaman and countless others uphold justice alongside Batman. Though still based in Gotham, Batman frequently finds himself outside city limits, facing situations that are both unfamiliar and exhilarating. With formidable foes at every turn, Batman must still rely on his stealth, resourcefulness and limitless supply of cool gadgets to bring justice home.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Join the Caped Crusader and a wealth of DCs finest as they team up to battle injustice in the third and final season of this cutting-edge series! Evil never sleeps in these diabolical schemes plotted by the worlds most infamous criminals including the Joker, Lex Luthor, Equinox and Ras Al Ghul! Thankfully, Batman and his many allies, including Superman, Green Lantern, Aquaman and Wonder Woman, are always up for the challenge! Circle this globe and others, and even travel through time in The Brave and The Bold's final action-packed, fun-filled season!

episodes.name: Rise of the Blue Beetle!
episodes.overview: Batman and the Blue Beetle attempt to stop an asteroid but end up on a distant planet fighting Kanjar Ro.

episodes.name: Terror on Dinosaur Island!
episodes.overview: When Gorilla Grodd creates a machine that will turn humans into primates, it's up to Batman and Plastic Man to save the day.

episodes.name: Evil Under the Sea!
episodes.overview: Batman investigates seismic activity and pays a visit to Aquaman, who is unaware that his brother Orm is conspiring with Black Manta to conquer Atlantis.

episodes.name: Invasion of the Secret Santas!
episodes.overview: After taking care of Sportsmaster with the Blue Beetle, Batman teams up with Red Tornado in order to stop the villain Fun Haus from ruining Christmas.

episodes.name: Day of the Dark Knight!
episodes.overview: After teaming up with Guy Gardner, Batman travels into the past with Green Arrow to stop Morgaine Le Fay from conquering Camelot.

episodes.name: Enter the Outsiders!
episodes.overview: Batman and Wildcat face off against a trio of super-powered teenagers who are attacking symbols of consumerism.

episodes.name: Dawn of the Dead Man!
episodes.overview: Batman teams up with Deadman to take down Gentleman Ghost.

episodes.name: Fall of the Blue Beetle!
episodes.overview: The Blue Beetle is determined to learn the fate of his predecessor, Ted Kord.

guest_stars.character: Ted Kord / Silver Age Blue Beetle (voice)
guest_stars.name: Wil Wheaton

episodes.name: Journey to the Center of the Bat!
episodes.overview: Atom and Aquaman shrink down and enter Batman's body in order to help him fight off a chemical infection.

episodes.name: The Eyes of Despero!
episodes.overview: Batman helps Guy Gardner and the remnants of the Green Lantern Corps fight against a would-be galactic conqueror.

episodes.name: Return of the Fearsome Fangs!
episodes.overview: When three of his former classmates kill their former martial arts teacher, Batman enlists the help of fellow student Bronze Tiger to stop them from stealing the powerful Wudang Totem that the elderly sensei was guarding.

episodes.name: Deep Cover for Batman!
episodes.overview: The Red Hood, a hero from an alternate dimension, enlists the Dark Knight's help against the Injustice Syndicate, a team of supervillains who are doppelgangers of Batman's friends back home.

episodes.name: Game Over for Owlman!
episodes.overview: After his evil counterpart from an alternate dimension undertakes a crime spree disguised as him, Batman finds help from an unexpected ally.

episodes.name: Mystery in Space!
episodes.overview: A melancholy Aquaman accompanies Batman to the planet Rann, where they aid Adam Strange in his fight against the Gordanians.

episodes.name: Trials of the Demon!
episodes.overview: Magically transported to 19th century London, Batman aids Etrigan the Demon and Sherlock Holmes in battling Gentleman Jim Craddock, the future Gentleman Ghost.

episodes.name: Night of the Huntress!
episodes.overview: While on the trail of mobsters Babyface and Mrs. Manface, Blue Beetle develops a crush on the sultry Huntress.

episodes.name: Menace of the Conqueror Caveman!
episodes.overview: Batman gets the unwelcome aid of the profit-seeking Booster Gold in his efforts to stop Kru'll the Eternal.

episodes.name: The Color of Revenge!
episodes.overview: Crazy Quilt is blinded by a young Robin. Years later, he comes to Blüdhaven looking for revenge.

episodes.name: Legends of the Dark Mite!
episodes.overview: Batman finds himself idolized by a powerful being from the fifth dimension.

episodes.name: Hail the Tornado Tyrant!
episodes.overview: The robotic superhero Red Tornado builds a "son" named Tornado Champion, but Batman's concerns are realized when the new robot turns itself into a villain named Tornado Tyrant.

episodes.name: Duel of the Double Crossers!
episodes.overview: Plucked from time by Mongul, Jonah Hex brings Batman to Warworld to fight in gladiatorial competitions.

episodes.name: The Last Bat on Earth!
episodes.overview: Batman pursues Gorilla Grodd into the future, where he enlists Kamandi's help against Grodd and his ape army.

episodes.name: When OMAC Attacks!
episodes.overview: Hawk & Dove help Batman stop an intergalactic war. Later, Batman and OMAC team up to stop an attack by Shrapnel.

episodes.name: Mayhem of the Music Meister!
episodes.overview: The Music Meister uses his ability to control minds in an effort to take over the world.

episodes.name: Inside the Outsiders!
episodes.overview: Batman and Green Arrow team up to retrieve a pair of statues stolen by Catwoman. Later, Batman tries to free the Outsiders from one of Psycho Pirate's machines.

episodes.name: The Fate of Equinox!
episodes.overview: After a battle with Two-Face, Batman and Dr. Fate must deal with Equinox who is attempting to replace both the Lords of Order and the Lords of Chaos.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Batman wings into an exciting new era, teaming with a mighty honour roll of DC Comics Super Heroes in the debut season of the smart, hip TV series! The Brave and the Bold features Batman and allies Aquaman, Green Arrow, Blue Beetle, Booster Gold, Robin, Wildcat, Deadman, Plastic Man, Red Tornado, Bronze Tiger, Dr. Fate and The Atom fighting foes from mad scientists to intergalactic crooks, from power-mad dictators to out-of-control teenagers teenagers! He even partners with another legendary detective: Sherlock Holmes! In this cool, cutting-edge and often funny series, bringing back old-school comic book styling and dry wit to crimefighting, Batman faces any peril - including other heroes stealing the show - in his relentless pursuit of justice.

episodes.name: Death Race to Oblivion!
episodes.overview: Mongul forces heroes (Batman, Green Arrow, Guy Gardner, Huntress, Plastic Man and Woozy Winks) and villains (Black Manta, Catwoman, Gentleman Ghost, Joker, and Steppenwolf) alike to race for Earth's survival.

guest_stars.character: Green Arrow / Guy Gardner / Mark Desmond (voice)
guest_stars.name: James Arnold Taylor

episodes.name: Long Arm of the Law!
episodes.overview: Batman and Plastic Man team up to save some scouts. Later, the two have must deal with Rubberneck and Kite Man who are targeting Plastic Man's family in a scheme for revenge.

episodes.name: Revenge of the Reach!
episodes.overview: The Challengers of the Unknown go to the island and are exposed to Starro. Later, Blue Beetle runs into trouble on Oa when the Green Lantern Corp try to arrest him for possessing the scarab.

guest_stars.character: Professor Mark Haley / Ace Morgan / Guardian 2 (voice)
guest_stars.name: Armin Shimerman

episodes.name: Aquaman's Outrageous Adventure!
episodes.overview: Batman and Enemy Ace stop aliens interfering in the past. Later, Aquaman takes his family on vacation and must resist his desire to fight crime.

episodes.name: The Golden Age of Justice!
episodes.overview: Batman and Detective Chimp work together to foil Falseface. Later, Batman and the Justice Society of America face off with Per Degaton.

guest_stars.character: Black Canary / Golden Age Black Canary (voice)
guest_stars.name: Grey DeLisle

episodes.name: Sidekicks Assemble!
episodes.overview: Robin, Speedy, and Aqualad team up to earn respect and stop Ra's Al Ghul from attacking the world.

episodes.name: Clash of the Metal Men!
episodes.overview: Aquaman falls to Starro. Meanwhile, Batman teams up with the Metal Men to defeat Chemo and, then, to save Doc Magnus from a team of powerful living gases.

episodes.name: A Bat Divided!
episodes.overview: The Riddler torments Booster Gold and Batman. Later, Batman bears witness to the creation of Firestorm. Unfortunately, in the explosion, Batman is divided into three different aspects of himself.

episodes.name: The Super-Batman of Planet X!
episodes.overview: Batman and the Metal Men fight Kanjar Ro. Later, Batman goes to the planet Zur-En-Arrh where he meets another Batman and develops superpowers.

episodes.name: The Power of Shazam!
episodes.overview: When Captain Marvel's enemies Black Adam and Dr Sivana team up, Marvel enlists Batman to aid him.

guest_stars.character: Dr. Sivana / Shazam the Wizard / Thaddeus Sivana Jr. (voice)
guest_stars.name: Jim Piddock

guest_stars.character: Billy Batson / Mary Batson / Georgia Sivana (voice)
guest_stars.name: Tara Strong

episodes.name: Chill of the Night!
episodes.overview: Batman and Zatanna make short work of Abra Kadabra. Later, Batman must choose between justice and vengeance when he confronts Joe Chill the man who murdered his parents.

episodes.name: Gorillas in Our Midst!
episodes.overview: Batman and Spectre deal with Dr. Milo. Later, Batman and Detective Chimp enlist Vixen and B'wana Beast in order to battle a conspiracy of ape villains: Gorilla Grodd, Gorilla Boss, and Monsieur Mallah.

guest_stars.character: B'Wana Beast / Detective Chimp / Monsieur Mallah (voice)
guest_stars.name: Kevin Michael Richardson

episodes.name: The Siege of Starro! (1)
episodes.overview: Led by Faceless Hunter, the Starro Invasion comes on full swing. Only Batman and a handful of unlikely heroes remain uninfected to thwart the alien parasites and their mind-controlled hosts before all of Earth is sucked dry.

episodes.name: The Siege of Starro! (2)
episodes.overview: Star Conqueror may be defeated, but Faceless Hunter is not! The alien warrior manipulates B'Wana Beast, forcing him to combine thetiny starros into one massive beast he plans to use to destroy the planet! But Batman has his own back-up - the Metal Men!

episodes.name: Requiem for a Scarlet Speedster!
episodes.overview: Barry Allen has long been presumed dead and his "ghost" has been haunting Jay Garrick and Kid Flash. When Batman sees it to, they realize he's not dead -- he's been kidnapped by Reverse Flash!

guest_stars.character: Jay Garrick / Golden Age Flash / Geo-Force (voice)
guest_stars.name: Andy Milder

episodes.name: The Last Patrol!
episodes.overview: The disunited super hero group "The Doom Patrol" must now unite once again to face their former enemies who have suddenly united against them.

episodes.name: The Mask of Matches Malone!
episodes.overview: Batman joins forces with Black Orchid as they both fight the seductive, but dangerous, Poison Ivy, along with her henchwomen.

episodes.name: Menace of the Madniks!
episodes.overview: Booster Gold misses his late best bud, Blue Beetle, but when he travels back in time to hang with him, he throws the present into chaos.

guest_stars.character: Ted Kord / Silver Age Blue Beetle (voice)
guest_stars.name: Wil Wheaton

episodes.name: Emperor Joker!
episodes.overview: Fifth-dimensional fan boy Bat-Mite inadvertently gives Joker his limitless power while hoping to witness a hero-villain showdown.

episodes.name: The Criss Cross Conspiracy!
episodes.overview: The long-retired Batwoman sees an opportunity for revenge against the villain who humiliated her: Riddler. In order to get back at him, she uses sorcerer Felix Faust to swap her body with Batmans. It's "Batman" vs,. Batwoman" vs. Riddler.

episodes.name: The Plague of the Prototypes!
episodes.overview: Batman sends a new squad of bat-robots against Black Mask. The robots are turned against their former master when Black Mask hacks into them. Batman prepares to fight the robots with his dog partner, Ace. They are also joined with the kindly robot prototype "Proto".

episodes.name: Cry Freedom Fighters!
episodes.overview: When an alien race tries to invade Earth, Batman, Plastic Man and the Freedom Fighters race to their planet to stop them. Thealien's numbers prove overwhelming and it falls on Plastic Man to find the patriotism within to stop them.

episodes.name: The Knights of Tomorrow!
episodes.overview: It is the story of Batman's retirement and his marriage to Catwoman. Bruce Wayne now hopes that his son Damian will follow in his footsteps, and his confidence in him will be put to the test.

episodes.name: Darkseid Descending!
episodes.overview: The threat of an impending invasion from Apokolips compels Batman, Aquaman, and Martian Manhunter to form a new Justice League.

episodes.name: Bat-Mite Presents: Batman's Strangest Cases!
episodes.overview: Bat-Mite hosts a series of Batman's most bizarre adventures including the Mad Magazine-inspired Batboy and Rubin, a Japanese-influenced Bat-Manga and a guest starring role from the Scooby Gang and Weird Al Yankovic.

episodes.name: The Malicious Mr. Mind!
episodes.overview: Batman joins forces with Captain Marvel, Mary Marvel, and Captain Marvel Jr. to take on Dr. Sivana and his Monster Society of Evil. However, the villains gain the most likely of newcomers -- the wormlike Mr. Mind.

guest_stars.character: Billy Batson / Mary Marvel / Toddler Batman (voice)
guest_stars.name: Tara Strong

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Braver. Bolder. Season two of Batman: The Brave and the Bold delivers more of the action you want, as the caped crusader continues to team up with heroes from across the DC Universe in this latest interpretation of the classic Batman franchise. Featuring non-stop adventure with a touch of comic relief, Blue Beetle, Green Arrow, Aquaman and countless others uphold justice alongside Batman. Though still based in Gotham, Batman frequently finds himself outside city limits, facing situations that are both unfamiliar and exhilarating. With formidable foes at every turn, Batman must still rely on his stealth, resourcefulness and limitless supply of cool gadgets to bring justice home.

episodes.name: Battle of the Superheroes!
episodes.overview: When Superman is affected by Red Kryptonite he becomes a super jerk. Batman must stop him from destroying his reputation and more.

episodes.name: Joker: The Vile and the Villainous!
episodes.overview: The Joker teams up with his criminal hero and inspiration, The Weeper, to take down their arch-nemesis Batman in this Jokerized episode where the roles are reversed.

episodes.name: Shadow of the Bat!
episodes.overview: Bat-Ape rescues Batman and Robin from Catwoman. Later, Batman is bitten by a vampire and turns on his friends in the Justice League International.

episodes.name: Night of the Batmen!
episodes.overview: Batman and Vigilante have a run in with some villains. Later Aquaman, Captain Marvel, Plastic Man, and Green Arrow try to fill in when Batmen is injured.

episodes.name: Scorn of the Star Sapphire!
episodes.overview: Hal Jordan, the Green Lantern, comes to Batman for help in defeating his nemesis, the beautiful supervillain Star Sapphire.

episodes.name: Time Out for Vengeance!
episodes.overview: The Creeper cheers on and helps Batman when he's fighting Hellgrammite. Then, the Justice League International travels to the past to stop the minions of Equinox from wiping out all the incarnations of Batman throughout time.

episodes.name: Sword of the Atom!
episodes.overview: Searching the Amazon jungle for the missing Ray Palmer, the scientist who was at one time The Atom, Batman disappears. Now Aquaman recruits the new Atom, Ryan Choi, to help shrink him down to microscopic size...

episodes.name: Triumvirate of Terror!
episodes.overview: After the world's greatest baseball game against the Legion of Doom, Batman, Superman and Wonder Woman face off against their arch-enemies Joker, Lex Luthor and Cheetah, who gain the upper hand by switching their respective opponents.

episodes.name: Bold Beginnings!
episodes.overview: After a team up with Space Ghost and his companions, Batman must come to the aid of three of his fellow superheroes who have fallen into the icy clutches of Mr. Freeze.

episodes.name: Powerless!
episodes.overview: Captain Atom joins the Justice League, but has to learn how to continue being a super hero even after losing his powers to his old enemy Major Force.

episodes.name: Crisis: 22,300 Miles Above Earth!
episodes.overview: While the Justice Society is visiting the Justice League for the first time, Batman is in Asia infiltrating a secret fortress where Ra's Al Ghul is plotting a new scheme for world domination.

episodes.name: Four Star Spectacular!
episodes.overview: Batman teams up with DC characters Adam Strange, the Flash, 'Mazing Man and the Creature Commandos in four separate teaser vignettes.

episodes.name: Mitefall!
episodes.overview: Bat-Mite tries to make the show so horrible it has to be cancelled.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Join the Caped Crusader and a wealth of DCs finest as they team up to battle injustice in the third and final season of this cutting-edge series! Evil never sleeps in these diabolical schemes plotted by the worlds most infamous criminals including the Joker, Lex Luthor, Equinox and Ras Al Ghul! Thankfully, Batman and his many allies, including Superman, Green Lantern, Aquaman and Wonder Woman, are always up for the challenge! Circle this globe and others, and even travel through time in The Brave and The Bold's final action-packed, fun-filled season!
